verses.verse: And it came to pass, when Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> had heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> those things, that he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to I-yovab <S%H3103><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon <S%H4068><s%>, and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph <S%H407><s%>,

And to the kings <S%H4428><s%> that were on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and of the plains <S%H6160><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Chinneroth <S%H3672><s%>, and in the valley <S%H8219><s%>, and in the borders <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>,

And to the Kanahanite <S%H3669><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> and on the west <S%H3220><s%>, and to the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Y'vusi <S%H2983><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> under Hermon <S%H2768><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>.

And they went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, they and all their hosts <S%H4264><s%> with them, much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that is upon the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H8193><s%> in multitude <S%H7230><s%>, with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>.

And when all these kings <S%H4428><s%> were met together <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom <S%H4792><s%>, to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of them: for to morrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> will I deliver them up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all slain <S%H2491><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: thou shalt hough <S%H6131><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with him, against them by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom <S%H4792><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%>; and they fell upon <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, who smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and chased <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto great <S%H7227><s%> Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, and unto Misrephothmaim <S%H4956><s%>, and unto the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>; and they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, until they left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them none remaining <S%H8300><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them as the YY <S%H3068><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: he houghed <S%H6131><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their horses <S%H5483><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> turned back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof with the sword <S%H2719><s%>: for Hazor <S%H2674><s%> beforetime <S%H6440><s%> was the head <S%H7218><s%> of all those kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>.

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them: there was not any left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to breathe <S%H5397><s%>: and he burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of those kings <S%H4428><s%>, and all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of them, did Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> take <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them, as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

But as for the cities <S%H5892><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> still in their strength <S%H8510><s%>, Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> none of them, save <S%H2108><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> only; that did Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of these cities <S%H5892><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> took for a prey <S%H962><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto themselves; but every man <S%H120><s%> they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, until they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them, neither left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> they any to breathe <S%H5397><s%>.

As the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, so did Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>; he left <S%H5493><s%> nothing <S%H1697><s%> undone <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all that land <S%H776><s%>, the hills <S%H2022><s%>, and all the south country <S%H5045><s%>, and all the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, and the valley <S%H8219><s%>, and the plain <S%H6160><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the valley <S%H8219><s%> of the same;

Havahn from the mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak <S%H2510><s%>, that goeth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Seir <S%H8165><s%>, even unto Baalgad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> under mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>: and all their kings <S%H4428><s%> he took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and slew <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them.
Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> with all those kings <S%H4428><s%>.

There was not a city <S%H5892><s%> that made peace <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, save the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Giv`on <S%H1391><s%>: all other they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

For it was of the YY <S%H3068><s%> to harden <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8763><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%>, that they should come against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%>, that he might destroy them utterly <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and that they might have no favour <S%H8467><s%>, but that he might destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And at that time <S%H6256><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, from Hevron <S%H2275><s%>, from Debir <S%H1688><s%>, from Anab <S%H6024><s%>, and from all the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and from all the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> destroyed them utterly <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with their cities <S%H5892><s%>.

There was none of the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: only in Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, in Gat <S%H1661><s%>, and in Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, there remained <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the whole land <S%H776><s%>, according to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>; and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%> by their tribes <S%H7626><s%>. And the land <S%H776><s%> rested <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from war <S%H4421><s%>.
